patthana16.21:4.1: Kusalaṃ cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.21:5.1: Akusalaṃ cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.21:6.1: Abyākataṃ cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.21:7.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana16.21:8.1: Kusalaṃ nocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nanocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.21:9.1: Akusalaṃ nocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nanocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.21:10.1: Abyākataṃ nocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nanocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.21:11.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate terasa.
